workflow.name: Automate lead qualification & personalized outreach with Jotform, GPT & Gmail
workflow.description:
Automatically qualify inbound demo requests, scrape prospect websites, and send AI-personalized outreach emails‚Äîall on autopilot.

## What This Workflow Does

This end-to-end lead automation workflow helps SaaS companies qualify and nurture inbound leads with zero manual work until human approval.

### Key Features

‚úÖ **Smart Email Filtering** - Automatically flags personal emails (Gmail, Yahoo, etc.) and routes them to a polite regret message  
‚úÖ **Website Intelligence** - Scrapes prospect websites and extracts business context  
‚úÖ **AI Analysis** - Uses OpenAI to score ICP fit, identify pain points, and find personalization opportunities  
‚úÖ **Personalized Outreach** - AI drafts custom emails referencing specific details from their website  
‚úÖ **Human-in-the-Loop** - Approval gate before sending to ensure quality control  
‚úÖ **Professional Branding** - Even rejected leads get a thoughtful response

## Perfect For

- B2B SaaS companies with inbound lead forms
- Sales teams drowning in demo requests
- Businesses wanting to personalize at scale
- Anyone needing intelligent lead qualification

## What You'll Need

- Jotform account (or any form tool with webhooks)
Create your form for free on [Jotform using this link](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)
- OpenAI API key
- Gmail account (or any email service)
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted)

## Workflow Sections

1. **üìß Lead Intake & Qualification** - Capture form submissions and filter personal emails
2. **üï∑Ô∏è Website Scraping** - Extract company information from their domain
3. **‚ùå Regret Flow** - Send polite rejection to unqualified leads
4. **ü§ñ AI Analysis** - Analyze prospects and draft personalized emails
5. **üì® Approved Outreach** - Human review + send welcome email

---

**Customization Tips:**

- Update the AI prompt with your company's ICP and value proposition
- Modify the personal email provider list based on your market
- Adjust the regret email template to match your brand voice
- Add Slack notifications for high-value leads
- Connect your CRM to log all activities

**Time Saved:** ~15-20 minutes per lead  
**Lead Response:** Under 5 minutes (vs hours/days manually)

workflow.name: Lead Analysis & Personalized Email Generation with OpenAI

parameters.text:
=We have a new inbound lead as someone left their email address on our landing page. We already scraped their website, find it below, and I now need you to analyze this prospect and help me write an initial outreach email.

Use Github-flavored-markdown for interest, ICP and personalization reasoning.
The email draft needs to be in html format though! should we well formatted,concise and have pointers instead of paragraphs.

Also fetch previous positive examples to use as a reference of what is a good analysis and email draft.

<Lead Info>
Email: {{ $('Jotform Trigger').item.json['E-mail'] }}
Website: {{ $('Extract Domain').item.json.websiteDomain }}
</Lead Info>

<Website Summary>
{{ $json.message.content }}
</Website Summary>

Today is {{ $today }}.

---

## ABOUT OUR COMPANY & OFFERINGS

**Company:** ClareVoice

**What We Do:**
ClareVoice provides enterprise-grade Voice AI Agent solutions that automate phone conversations and customer interactions. Our AI agents handle inbound and outbound calls with human-like conversation quality, helping businesses scale their customer communications without scaling headcount.

**Core Solutions:**

1. **Inbound AI Agents**
   - 24/7 customer support and inquiry handling
   - Appointment scheduling and booking
   - Order status and tracking
   - Lead qualification and routing
   - FAQ handling and information delivery

2. **Outbound AI Agents**
   - Lead follow-up and nurturing
   - Appointment confirmations and reminders
   - Customer satisfaction surveys
   - Payment reminders and collections
   - Re-engagement campaigns

3. **Integration Capabilities**
   - Seamless CRM integration (Salesforce, HubSpot, etc.)
   - Calendar systems (Google Calendar, Outlook, etc.)
   - Ticketing systems (Zendesk, Freshdesk, etc.)
   - Custom API integrations
   - Real-time data synchronization

**Key Benefits:**
- Reduce response times from hours to seconds
- Handle unlimited concurrent calls
- Lower operational costs by 60-80%
- Improve customer satisfaction with instant responses
- Scale during peak periods without additional staffing
- Capture every lead - no missed calls
- Multilingual support capabilities
- Detailed analytics and conversation insights

**Ideal Customer Profile (ICP):**
- **Industries:** Healthcare, Real Estate, Home Services, E-commerce, Financial Services, SaaS, Automotive, Legal Services
- **Company Size:** 10-500 employees
- **Pain Points:** High call volumes, missed calls, slow response times, expensive customer support teams, after-hours inquiries, lead follow-up delays
- **Use Cases:** Businesses with repetitive phone tasks, appointment-based services, high inbound inquiry volume, or struggling with lead response times

**Differentiators:**
- Natural, conversational AI (not robotic)
- Custom training on your business processes
- White-glove onboarding and setup
- Enterprise-level security and compliance
- Real human escalation when needed
- Continuous learning and improvement

**Pricing Model:**
- Flexible plans based on call volume and features
- Custom enterprise solutions available
- ROI typically achieved within 3 months

---

## YOUR TASK

1. **Analyze the prospect** based on their website summary:
   - Industry and business model
   - Potential pain points that ClareVoice could solve
   - ICP fit score (High/Medium/Low) with reasoning
   - Specific use cases that would resonate

2. **Identify personalization opportunities:**
   - Specific services they offer that could benefit from Voice AI
   - Business challenges visible on their website
   - Growth indicators or scaling signals
   - Recent changes or initiatives mentioned

3. **Draft an outreach email:**
   - Subject line (compelling and personalized)
   - Email body (conversational, value-focused, not salesy)
   - Clear call-to-action
   - Keep it under 150 words
   - Reference something specific from their website
   - Focus on ONE specific use case that's most relevant to them

values.content:
=We scraped a website. Please summarize the content in markdown (gfm) in 2-3 paragraphs highlighting their industry, positioning, service or product offerings and any hints on recent activities and strategic moves.

<ScrapingResult>
{{ $json.html }}
</ScrapingResult>

parameters.content:
## üï∑Ô∏è Scrape & Summarize Company Website

Automatically extracts and analyzes the prospect's website to understand their business.

### Flow

**URL to HTML** üåê ‚Üí **AI Summarization** ü§ñ

1. Fetches full website content from the extracted domain
2. AI analyzes the HTML to extract key business info:
   - Industry & services offered
   - Pain points & use cases
   - Company size & signals
   - Personalization opportunities

**Output:** Structured summary used for lead scoring and personalized outreach ‚ú®

parameters.subject: =Email Ready for New Lead -  {{ $('Jotform Trigger').item.json['E-mail'] }}

parameters.content:
## üìß Lead Intake & Email Qualification

Captures demo requests and filters out personal emails to focus on qualified business leads.

### Flow
**Jotform Trigger** üéØ ‚Üí **Extract Domain** üîó ‚Üí **Flag Personal Email** üö© ‚Üí **Route Lead** ‚ö°

1. Form submission captured via **Jotform** ([Sign up here](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade))
2. Email domain extracted (`mediajade.com` + `https://mediajade.com`)
3. Checked against personal providers (Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook, etc.)
4. Business emails continue ‚Üí Personal emails get regret message

**Result:** Sales team only sees qualified B2B prospects ‚úÖ

parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('Jotform Trigger').item.json['Full Name'].first }},

Thanks so much for your interest in ClareVoice and taking the time to fill out our demo request form.

After reviewing your information, it looks like our Voice AI Agent solutions might not be the best fit for your current needs at this time. We typically work with businesses that handle high volumes of phone calls or have appointment-based services where automation can deliver significant ROI.

That said, if your communication needs change or your call volume increases in the future, we'd love to reconnect. Feel free to reach out anytime at [your email].

I appreciate you considering ClareVoice, and I wish you all the best with [their company name]!

Best,
Jitesh Dugar
Founder - ClareVoice
parameters.subject: Re: Your ClareVoice Demo Request

parameters.content:
## ‚ùå Send Regret Email

Politely declines unqualified leads (personal emails) while keeping the door open for future opportunities.

Sends a friendly rejection email explaining:
- ClareVoice may not be the right fit at this time
- Why they didn't qualify (personal email/small business)
- Invitation to reconnect when they scale

**Result:** Professional brand experience + potential future lead nurtured ü§ù

## ü§ñ Personalized Email

AI agent analyzes qualified leads and drafts personalized outreach emails with human approval.

### Flow

**AI Sales Agent** üß† ‚Üí **Wait for Approval** ‚è∏Ô∏è ‚Üí **Send Welcome Email** üìß

1. **AI Agent** analyzes website summary using OpenAI
   - Scores ICP fit (High/Medium/Low)
   - Identifies pain points & use cases
   - Drafts personalized email referencing their business
   - Uses structured output parser for consistent formatting

2. **Human Review** checks AI analysis and email draft before sending

3. **Gmail** sends approved personalized welcome email

**Result:** High-quality, researched outreach that resonates with each prospect üéØ

user.name: Jitesh Dugar
user.bio: AI Automation Specialist - OpenAI, CRM & Automation Expert with a solid understanding of various tools that include Zapier, Make, Zoho CRM, Hubspot, Google Sheets, Airtable, Pipedrive, Google Analytics, and more.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
